# HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.unknown

**Case**

The authorization request status could not be determined because an error occurred.

## Declaration

```swift
case unknown
```

## Statuses

- **HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.shouldRequest**: The application has not yet requested authorization for all the specified data types.
- **HKAuthorizationRequestStatus.unnecessary**: The application has already requested authorization for all the specified data types.
